title: Awarding the Contract for the Construction of the Proposed Building for the Department of Census and Statistics - Phase 2
decision_details: - the Department of Census and Statistics is housed in 06 locations in Colombo at present and it has been decided to construct a new building for this Department to house all the divisions in one building.  Stage I of the Project was implemented with funds from the World Bank and the Government of Sri Lanka. The proposal made by H.E. the President, on the recommendation of the Standing Cabinet Appointed Procurement Committee, to award the contract for Phase II of the Project  for a total contract  sum of Rs.727,529,015.16 with funds to be provided by the Government, was approved by the Cabinet.
